Body:
"""Test to cover unlink snapshot."""
snapshot_info, sg_name = self.create_sg_snapshot()
target_sg = '{sg}_lnk'.format(sg=sg_name)
snap_name = snapshot_info.get('name')
self.replication.modify_storage_group_snapshot(src_storage_grp_id=sg_name,
    tgt_storage_grp_id=target_sg, snap_name=snap_name, gen_num=0, link=True)
linked_snap_details = self.replication.get_snapshot_generation_details(sg_id
    =sg_name, snap_name=snap_name, gen_num=0)
self.assertEqual(True, linked_snap_details.get('isLinked'))
self.replication.modify_storage_group_snapshot(src_storage_grp_id=sg_name,
    tgt_storage_grp_id=target_sg, snap_name=snap_name, gen_num=0, unlink=True)
snap_details = self.replication.get_snapshot_generation_details(sg_id=
    sg_name, snap_name=snap_name, gen_num=0)
self.assertEqual(False, snap_details.get('isLinked'))
self.provisioning.delete_storage_group(storage_group_id=target_sg)
